entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is the mother of Bill, Charlie, Fred, George, Ginny, Percy, Ron, and Mundungus Fletcher. She is standing up and shouting at her husband.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is the father of Bill, Charlie, Fred, George, Ginny, Percy, Ron, and Mundungus Fletcher. He is having a conversation with his wife about their children.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is one of the twins who are legally adults now. His mother is trying to stop him from doing something.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is one of the twins who are legally adults now. His mother is trying to stop him from doing something.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts and the cousin of Harry Potter. He is arguing with his mother about staying at home.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts and the cousin of Ron Weasley. He is having a conversation with Ron about telling their secrets to each other.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a student at Hogwarts and one of Harry's best friends. She is beaming along with Ron when he says he will tell her everything.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is the younger sister of Fred and George Weasley. Her mother is shouting at her to go to bed.
